snippet: EARLY--Ann M. (Busto). On April 1, 2016. Beloved aunt and friend. Retired fashion buyer and consummate New Yorker. She loved Sinatra, the Yankees, jazz, opera, art, the Union Square Farmer's Market, the Jupiter Symphony, Sea Bright, Art Deco, Noritake, Cecil Beaton, movies, and Swedish mysteries. Contributions to WQXR. 1/3
lead_paragraph: EARLY--Ann M. (Busto). On April 1, 2016. Beloved aunt and friend. Retired fashion buyer and consummate New Yorker. She loved Sinatra, the Yankees, jazz, opera, art, the Union Square Farmer's Market, the Jupiter Symphony, Sea Bright, Art Deco, Noritake, Cecil Beaton, movies, and Swedish mysteries. Contributions to WQXR. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EARLY, ANN M
